title: Jbang build on github actions fails with an HTTP status 409

labels.name: area/jbang
labels.description: Issues related to when using jbang.dev with Quarkus

body:
### Describe the bug

Quarkus version: `Quarkus-999-SNAPSHOT`

Jbang build is failing on Github actions with the following error: 

```
Error: 9,211 INFO  [jbang] [ERROR] Issue running postBuild()
```

GH actions log: https://github.com/quarkus-qe/quarkus-test-suite/runs/4846688325?check_suite_focus=true#step:9:20169

Reproducer: 
https://github.com/pjgg/quarkus-test-suite/tree/feat/Quarkus-cli-gradle-jbang
```
mvn clean verify -Dall-modules -Dinclude.quarkus-cli-tests -Dts.quarkus.cli.cmd=/home/pablojosegonzalezgranados/Documents/quarkus-cli/quar
kus-dev-cli -Dit.test=QuarkusCliCreateJvmApplicationIT#shouldCreateApplicationWithJbangOnJvm -pl quarkus-cli
```

**Note:** be sure that `QuarkusCliCreateJvmApplicationIT#shouldCreateApplicationWithJbangOnJvm` is enabled

_No response_
